Title: UDF Factory
Description: A pure C#, Metro-friendly library for creating UDF 1.02 (ECMA-167) filesystem images.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A pure C#, Metro-friendly library for creating UDF 1.02 (ECMA-167) filesystem images.

Was going to be a UDF 1.02 library for WinRT. Due to Microsoft dropping support for MPEG-2 in C#, this project was never completed and is suspended indefinitely :-[
